alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:09PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe and northern Miami-Dade Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1209 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Redland, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Sweetwater, Florida City, Medley, Homestead Base, Naranja, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Leisure City, Pennsuco, Zoo Miami, Goulds and Fortymile Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
